Package  Class  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help

Package <Unnamed>

Class Summary
BitfieldMessage Bitfield Messages are exchanged between peers to tell other peers what pieces the sending peer has.
FileHandler FileHandler class is responsible for all interactions with our outputted files
HaveMessage Representation of a HAVE message in the BT protocol.
Message Basic implementation for all messages between peers using the BT protocol.
Message.ChokeMessage Message representing a CHOKE message in the BT protocol.
Message.InterestedMessage Message representing an INTERESTED Message in the BT protocol.
Message.KeepAliveMessage Message representing a Keep Alive message in the BT protocol.
Message.UnchokeMessage Message representing an UNCHOKE message in the BT protocol.
Message.UninterestedMessage Message representing an NOT INTERESTED message in the BT protocol.
Peer The peer class maintains a connection for a peer, peer state, and peer data
PeerOutThread PeerOutThread is responsible for all outgoing messages to a peer.
Piece Piece class is responsible for managing pieces of a torrent.
PieceMessage Piece Messages send a specified piece of data from one peer to another piece: The piece message is variable length, where X is the length of the block.
Protocol Key Constants used by BitTorrent protocol
RequestMessage Representation of a REQUEST message from a Peer.
RUBTClient RUBTClient is the main class of our program.
RUBTUtil The RUBTUtil class contains assorted utility functions
Torrent Torrent class is responsible for managing peers, pieces and the tracker in order to successfully download a file
Tracker Tracker class is reponsible for all communication with the tracker
